title: Expert Development Program for Digital Music Creation Based on Blended Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic music theory and understanding of DAW (Digital Audio Workstation) interfaces
context.additional_context: Learners, as professionals in medical/legal/technical fields with advanced domain expertise, acquire skills in using DAW (Ableton Live) and hardware controllers (Push) via personal devices (BYOD)

learning_goals: Learners can create digital music compositions of three minutes or longer using DAWs and hardware controllers
Learners can self-directly acquire music production skills through video materials and asynchronous discussions provided in a blended learning environment
Learners can resolve technical issues arising during digital music creation through peer feedback and formative assessments
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
